data.name: Banned
data.value: This password has been found in a data breach and could be used to hack your account. It is unsafe and should not be used here or for any other accounts.

data.name: BannedNormalizedPassword
data.value: This password has been found in a data breach and could be used to hack your account. It is unsafe and should not be used here or for any other accounts.

data.name: BannedNormalizedWord
data.value: This password has been found in a data breach and could be used to hack your account. It is unsafe and should not be used here or for any other accounts.

data.name: ChangeSuccessful
data.value: Your password has been updated successfully!

data.name: ComplexityPointsNotMet
data.value: Your password did not meet the complexity requirements.

data.name: ComplexityThresholdNotMet
data.value: Your password did not meet the complexity requirements.

data.name: ConfirmNewPassword
data.value: Confirm New Password

data.name: ConfirmPasswordIsRequired
data.value: Password confirmation cannot be blank. Please enter your desired password twice to continue.

data.name: ContainsAccountName
data.value: Your password cannot contain your username.

data.name: ContainsFullName
data.value: Your password cannot contain any part of your name.

data.name: CurrentPassword
data.value: Current Password

data.name: CurrentPasswordIsRequired
data.value: Existing password cannot be blank. Please enter your current password to continue.

data.name: DidNotMatchApprovalRegex
data.value: Your password was explicitly rejected according to the complexity requirements.

data.name: FilterError
data.value: Something went wrong internally. Please contact your system administration team to report this issue.

data.name: GeneralError
data.value: Something went wrong attempting to validate your password against the system rules. Please contact your system administration team to report this issue.

data.name: InvalidUserOrPassword
data.value: Unable to validate your existing credentials. Have you entered your current username and password correctly?

data.name: LengthRequirementsNotMet
data.value: Your password is not long enough.

data.name: MatchedRejectRegex
data.value: Your password was explicitly rejected according to the complexity requirements.

data.name: NewPassword
data.value: New Password

data.name: NewPasswordIsRequired
data.value: A new password must be entered twice to continue.

data.name: PasswordDoesNotMeetPolicy
data.value: That password does not meet our complexity requirements. Please review the instructions above and choose a slightly more difficult password to continue.

data.name: PasswordIsPwned
data.value: According to HaveIBeenPwned, that password has been compromised {0} times. Please choose a different password to continue.

data.name: PasswordPwned
data.value: According to HaveIBeenPwned, that password has been compromised {0} times. Please choose a different password to continue.

data.name: PasswordsDoNotMatch
data.value: The confirmation password did not match the new password entered. Please enter your desired password twice to continue.

data.name: PasswordWasBlank
data.value: Your password cannot be blank.

data.name: UnhandledError
data.value: Something went wrong attempting to validate your details. Please contact your system administration team to report this issue.

data.name: UserName
data.value: Username

data.name: UserNameIsRequired
data.value: Username cannot be blank. Please enter your account login to continue.
